enWisdom: The most wretched among you are the most greedy among you

Wisdom: أَشْقَى النَّاسِ مَنْ بَاعَ دِينَهُ بِدُنْيَا غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: The most wretched of [all] people is one who sells his religion for someone else’s worldly gain

Wisdom: أَشْقَى النَّاسِ مَنْ غَلَبَهُ هَوَاهُ فَمَلَكَتْهُ دُنْيَاهُ وَأَفْسَدَ أُخْرَاهُ
enWisdom: The most wretched person is one who is overcome by his vain desire so his worldly life gains mastery over him and he corrupts his Hereafter
Verily from wretchedness is corruption of one’s Hereafter

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَخْسَرَ النَّاسِ صَفْقَةً وَأَخْيَبَهُمْ سَعْياً رَجُلٌ أَخْلَقَ بَدَنَهُ فِي طَلَبِ آمَالِهِ وَلَمْ تُسَاعِدْهُ الْمَقَادِيرُ عَلَى إِرَادَتِهِ فَخَرَجَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا بِحَسَرَاتِهِ وَقَدِمَ عَلَى الْآخِرَةِ بِتَبِعَاتِهِ
enWisdom: The one who is worst in bargaining and most unsuccessful in striving is he who exerts himself in seeking the realization of his hopes while fate does not help him in his aims, and [as a result] he leaves this world in a sorrowful state and proceeds to the next world where he faces the consequences

Wisdom: لَنْ يُدْرِكَ النَّجَاةَ مَنْ لَمْ يَعْمَلْ بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: One who does not act upon the truth will never attain salvation
Hard-heartedness is from the greatest wretchedness

Wisdom: لَا يَسْعَدُ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا بِإِقَامَةِ حُدُودِ اللَّهِ وَلَا يَشْقَى أَحَدٌ إِلَّا بِإِضَاعَتِهَا
enWisdom: No one attains felicity except by upholding the bounds of Allah and no one becomes wretched except by disregarding them
